events.description: Gleyber Torres singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Jake Fraley, deflected by shortstop Matt McLain.
Aaron Judge singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jake Fraley. Gleyber Torres to 2nd.

Anthony Rizzo grounds into a double play, second baseman Jonathan India to shortstop Matt McLain to first baseman Spencer Steer. Gleyber Torres to 3rd. Aaron Judge out at 2nd. Anthony Rizzo out at 1st. 2 outs
